page.title: 14USE OF THE RIVER STORT IN 85
page.content: One of the things the rivewr is used for today is canoeing.The canoe club store their canoeing equipment in the farmers Southmill lock-keepers cottage. The old lock is still in working order. It has been painted black and white and their is a badge to show when the lock was last repaired. They have made a special plank to slide the canoes down into the water. In our school there were 19 children that had been fishing in the Stort. One boy was trying to get a licence to fish. There were 32 children who went horse riding by the river and 32 children had beenon a boat on the river. A company called Elliots have just started building houses there because it is such a lovely place. There will be problems with the cars because of the parking. The fumes may destroy the flowers.
